package.description: This package contains version 2.7.5 of the Bullet professional free 3D Game Multiphysics Library. The ROS package automatically downloads, extracts and compiles a tarball. For each major release of the Bullet library, the tarball will get updated. The Bullet library provided by this ROS package is slightly different form the official Bullet release. This package modifies the 3-argument constructor of a quaternion: Quaternion(r, p, y), with r the rotation around the fixed x-axis, p the rotation around the fixed y-axis and y the rotation around the fixed z-axis. We have the intention to move towards the official version of Bullet; this however will take some time because it involves a number of deprecation cycles for the conflicting quaternion constructor.
